title: Lynda - HTML5 Canvas and WebGL in Flash Professional CC
description:

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.


1h 36m Intermediate Aug 11, 2015   | Uploaded in Mar 5, 2016 by 2boweb

Subject: Web 
Software: Flash Professional HTML 
Author: Joseph Labrecque 

No longer restricted to only ActionScript and Flash Player, Flash Professional CC offers more publishing possibilities than ever before. Developers can now use Flash to build assets and animation that target platforms such as HTML5 Canvas and WebGL. And adding JavaScript allows for playback on just about any modern desktop or mobile device.â€¨â€¨This course focuses on using Flash Professional CC to create a shared pool of content for a set of related projects: an HTML5 video, an interactive ad, and a simple web-based game. Author Joseph Labrecque shows how to use Flash's familiar toolset to build and manage assets that fit into a modern web publishing workflow.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Using code snippets and actions
	â€¢	Assembling and animating a scene for video
	â€¢	Rendering the video
	â€¢	Laying out an ad with WebGL and JavaScript
	â€¢	Programming a game in HTML5 Canvas
